content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to search for hiking trails near me, which returned a list of results from AllTrails and Yelp.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/lists/hiking-trails-near-me", "question": "Which hiking trail do you want to learn more about?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a website that provides information and reviews on hiking trails near the user's location, including the Cross Bay and West Pond Loop Trail and the Ridgewood Reservoir. The reviews mention issues with mosquitoes and construction on some of the trails.\n\nLinks: ['Learn more (https://www.alltrails.com/privacy)', 'AllTrails (https://www.alltrails.com/?ref=header)', 'Explore (https://www.alltrails.com/explore?ref=header)', 'Community (https://www.alltrails.com/community?ref=header)', 'Saved (https://www.alltrails.com/members/slug/favorites?ref=header)']", type='action_result')]
"""
